ua.khpi.hrynevych.task05.subtask05

Class Subtask0501

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.khpi.hrynevych.task05.subtask05.Subtask0501

  • public final class Subtask0501
extends java.lang.Object
    Class organizing reading and writing using standard synchronized block.
    Version:
    1.0, 03 Dec 2017
    Author:
    Hrynevych Pavlo

    • Method Detail

      • read

        private static void read(java.lang.String threadName)
                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Signals that the specified thread got read the information from the buffer.
        Parameters:
        threadName - name of the thread that reads information
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if specified thread was interrupted

      • write

        private static void write()
                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Writes randomly generated text to the buffer.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the writing thread was interrupted

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Demonstrates results of the work current part of Subtask 05. Writer writes to the buffer and readers alternately read information from it. After all the readers got read the information new cycle begins. The number of such cycles is determined by the field ITERATION_NUMBER of the class.
        Parameters:
        args - command line parameters
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if something went wrong with the working threads
